ing: 1 (12 ounce) can chunk light tuna in water, drained
1/4 cup reduced-fat mayonnaise, or as needed
des: "An easy, QUICK, but absolutely delicious recipe that's great on sandwiches, with crackers, or even on its own. Kids love it too!"
ins: Place the tuna into a bowl with the peas, and lightly stir to break up the tuna and combine with the peas. Add the mayonnaise, garlic powder, and pepper, and stir to mix well.
